skill.name: Unlocking the Mastermind
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place a doctors bag.

skill.name: Cable Guy
skill.ace: Increase your cable tie supply by 4.

skill.name: Combat Medic
skill.normal: After you have revived a crew member, you receive a 25% damage bonus for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: Reviving a crew member gives them 30% more health.

skill.name: Endurance
skill.ace: Increases stamina for you and your crew by 50%.

skill.name: Control Freak
skill.normal: Civilians remain intimidated 50% longer. Noise created by you intimidates civilians.
skill.ace: Unlocks special Inside Man assets in the Job Overview menu.

skill.name: Painkillers
skill.normal: Crew members you revive take 10% less damage for 5 seconds.
skill.ace: The damage reduction is increased by an additional 20%.

skill.name: Leadership
skill.normal: You and your crew's weapon stability with pistols is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: You and your crew's weapon stability with all weapons is increased by 50%.

skill.name: Spotter
skill.normal: Special enemies marked by you take 15% additional damage. Range can be increased with Dominator Aced.
skill.ace: Unlocks the Spotter asset in the Job Overview menu. During stealth, the Spotter will highlight guards for you and your crew. If stealth is not an option, the Spotter will highlight special enemies for you and your crew.

skill.name: Equilibrium
skill.normal: Increases accuracy with pistols and akimbo weapons by 10% and decreases the time it takes to pull and put them away by 50%.
skill.ace: Increases your rate of fire with pistols and akimbo weapons by 100%.

skill.name: Dominator
skill.normal: You and your crew can now intimidate 1 additional non-special enemy into a hostage. Less well trained enemies are easier to intimidate.
skill.ace: The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%.

skill.name: Stockholm Syndrome
skill.normal: Nearby civilians have a chance of reviving you if you interact with them.
skill.ace: Civilians reviving you have a chance of giving you ammunition.

skill.name: Combat Doctor
skill.normal: You can now place 2 doctor bags instead of just one.
skill.ace: Your doctor bags have 2 more charges.

skill.name: Joker
skill.normal: You can convert a non-special enemy to fight on your side. This cannot be done during stealth and the enemy must have surrendered in order for you to convert it. You can only convert one non-special enemy at a time.
skill.ace: The converted enemy gains 55% more health and deals 45% more damage. The time to convert an enemy is reduced by 65%.

skill.name: Kilmer
skill.normal: Increases your reload speed with assault rifles and sniper rifles by 25%.
skill.ace: Your weapon accuracy while moving with assault rifles and sniper rifles is increased by 50%. Run and reload - you can now reload your weapons while sprinting.

skill.name: Gunslinger
skill.normal: You reload pistols and akimbo weapons 50% faster.
skill.ace: You deal +15 additional damage with pistols and +7.5 additional damage with akimbo weapons.

skill.name: Partner in Crime
skill.normal:
Having a converted enemy increases your movement speed by 10%.
Your converted enemy takes 40% less damage.
skill.ace:
Having a converted enemy increases your health by 20%.
Your converted enemy takes 40% less damage.

skill.name: Hostage Taker
skill.normal: Having at least one hostage makes you regenerate 1.5% health every 5 seconds.
skill.ace: Having at least one hostage makes you regenerate 4.5% health every 5 seconds.

skill.name: Pistol Messiah
skill.normal: When in bleedout, you are instantly revived if you kill an enemy with a pistol. You only have 1 charge. You will replenish your charge when you get out of custody.
skill.ace: You gain an additional 2 charges. You will replenish your charges when you get out of custody. (Stacks with basic skill for 3 total charges).

skill.name: Inspire
skill.normal: You revive crew members 50% faster. Shouting at your teammates within 7 meters will increase their movement and reload speed by 20% for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: here is a 75% chance that you can revive crew members at a distance of 7 meters by shouting at them. Range is not affected by Dominator Aced.
